A caravan of Central American migrants who still heading north through southern Mexico toward the U.S border NPR's Carrie Kahn reports that while the group still consists of thousands its size appears
To be decreasing the line of migrants stretch more than a mile on the highway north out of the town of Memphis Tibet ... thousands spent the night and the town's main plaza
